attributes.action: KERB LOOSE TALK FROM THE CHANCELLOR OF THE EXCHEQUER, BANK OF ENGLAND, TREASURY AND CABINET
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CURTAIL SPECULATIVE UN-SUBSTANTIATED OPINION ABOUT THE ECONOMY UNLESS BASED UPON IRREFUTABLE EXPERT FACT AS THIS GOVERNMENT AND IT'S SERVANTS HAS CAUSED ENOUGH DAMAGE TO THE BRITISH ECONOMY, WHICH IS NOT A GLOBAL PROBLEM, IT'S A DEVISIVE NATIONAL POLITICAL PROBLEM, THROUGH LOOSE TALK AND SPECULATION.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read. Please make it clear what action you are requesting the government take.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
